When the wearer has 50% Hit Points or less, they have an additional Bonus Action.

Non-Cantrip spells deal an additional 1d4 Force damage damage when the wearer drops to half their Hit Points of lower.

Dealing damage with this weapon heals the wielder for 1d6 hit points and instills them with an insatiable hunger - they can go Mad if they do not deal damage each turn.
